external_references.description: CISA. (2023, November 16). Cybersecurity Advisory: Scattered Spider (AA23-320A). Retrieved March 18, 2024.

description: [Scattered Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1015) adds a federated identity provider to the victim’s SSO tenant and activates automatic account linking.(Citation: CISA Scattered Spider Advisory November 2023)
